prompt: Film-still: lone dream runner sprints up a warped crimson hotel stairwell, chasing his own blurred reflection; below, the crowned Skeleton King in bone-white suit climbs upside-down, silver molten light pouring from his eye sockets, walls breathing, numbers melting, perspective tilting 45°—hyper-cinematic, Kubrick lens, cold fluorescence, grainy 35mm, tension horror vibe
Zoom toward a peeling "sys/dreamsim" doorplate; its screen brightens with the same prompt list, silver vapor hissing out of the keyhole as the camera tilts 30° down the slanted corridor.
